dict.acceptation: 装腔作势地说；喃喃地说，心不在焉地说，言不由衷地说；

sent.orig: Because it passes from mouth to mouth.
sent.trans: 因为它从一张嘴？传到另一张嘴？

sent.orig: These are all examples where CPR with mouth-to-mouth breathing may be more helpful that hands-only CPR.
sent.trans: 所以的例子显示人工呼吸比仅使用手的心脏复苏术更有帮助。

sent.orig: Burying her mouth in Xiaoqiao's hair, she sobbed and chewed Xiaoqiao's hair in her mouth.
sent.trans: 她把嘴埋在小巧的头发里，一边哭，一边用舌头把小巧的头发卷到嘴里嚼着。

sent.orig: NOTE: Mouth-to-mouth resuscitation is not recommended.
sent.trans: 注意：不推荐进行嘴对嘴人工呼吸。

sent.orig: They got the news from mouth to mouth.
sent.trans: 他们从别人口中得到这个消息。
